allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Ocean Current Simulator with mock data

- Fixed initialization order bug (dataPanel setup before scene setup)
- Complete 3D visualization with particles and vector fields
- Interactive controls for river discharge, wind, and tides
- Mock data generation using CurrentDataGenerator

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Integrate real buoy data from CSV file

Major changes:
- Added BuoyDataLoader to parse 17,494 hourly records from CSV
- Created FieldInterpolator to map 256-point spatial grid to visualization
- Replaced mock CurrentDataGenerator with real-time data playback
- Added TimelineControl UI for scrubbing through time-series data
- Updated DataPanel to display actual measurements (river discharge, sea level, air temp)
- Modified ParticleSystem to work independently without data generator
- Simplified ControlPanel for real data visualization mode

Features:
- Timeline playback with play/pause, step forward/backward controls
- Variable playback speed (0.5x to 10x)
- Display of ocean regime clusters (Wind/Tidal/River-Dominated)
- Real buoy station velocity measurements
- Date/time navigation through 2023-2024 dataset

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Update cluster labels and remove forcing influence chart

Changes:
- Corrected cluster names based on analysis:
  - Cluster 0: Tide + River Dominated
  - Cluster 1: Wind/Storm-Dominated
  - Cluster 2: River Discharge Dominated
- Removed inaccurate forcing influence chart calculation
- Kept cluster-based ocean regime display

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add GitHub Pages deployment configuration

- Set base path in vite.config.js for GitHub Pages
- Add deploy script to package.json
- Install gh-pages for automated deployment

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
